FuncDef:
The authentication command enables multicast user authentication.
The undo authentication command disables multicast user authentication.
By default, multicast user authentication is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After this command is configured for a multicast profile, all users in the domain with which the multicast profile is associated need be authenticated when they use the multicast services.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
